summary: Strasbourg is a major city in eastern France, near the border with Germany. It's known for being one of the capitals of the European Union, as it's home to important organizations like the European Parliament. The city has a rich history and unique culture, blending French and German influences. Strasbourg is also an important transportation hub and has a large port on the Rhine River. Its historic center is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. With over 800,000 people in its metropolitan area, it's a significant city in France and Europe.
title: Strasbourg
